sentence.text: Furthermore, we identified some potential lung cancer driver genes, such as negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, G1/S transition of mitotic cell cycle, protein-containing complex assembly, protein phosphorylation, and anaphase-promoting complex-dependent catabolic process, whose expression is significantly upregulated in lung cancer, and the copy number of these genes is amplified in the genome of patients with lung cancer.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
G1/S transition of mitotic cell cycle
